channel.title: Gen Graardor hits 0s?
channel.description:
okay wtf..my bandos general hits 0s..and wont die..ive added him into my npc.cfg what else shud i do heres my class8 code.. [code]if(i == 117) { // NPC ID
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack";
int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61; // Original model color class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926; // Changed model color
class5.anIntArray94 = new int[2]; // Number of models the NPC uses class5.anIntArray94[0] = 27785; // add the model id's here class5.anIntArray94[1] = 27789; // model id
class5.aString65 = "General Graardor"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 624; //combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "The mighty lord Bandos!".getBytes(); // NPC description }[/code]
anything wrong with it :confused: ..im new to clients so i really dont know..HELP thanks in advance..
-t0xic

item.title: Gen Graardor hits 0s?
item.dc:creator: @CripScape_Jeff CripScape Jeff
item.description:
@CripScape_Jeff wrote:

go to npchandler.java and look for somthing like this

} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 913) {
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30);

change the npc id to gens id and change the 30 to what u want his max hit to be

Read full topic

item.title: Gen Graardor hits 0s?
item.dc:creator: @lunden lunden
item.description:
@lunden wrote:

class5.anIntArray94[0] = 27785; // add the model id's here class5.anIntArray94[1] = 27789; // model id

should be :

class5.anIntArray94[0] = 5000; // add the model id's here class5.anIntArray94[1] = 5001; // model id

item.title: Gen Graardor hits 0s?
item.dc:creator: @t0xicn3ss t0xicn3ss
item.description:
@t0xicn3ss wrote:

okay wtf…my bandos general hits 0s…and wont die…ive added him into my npc.cfg what else shud i do heres my class8 code…

[code]if(i == 117) { // NPC ID

aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; 
class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data
class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack";

int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC
class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors];
class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors];
class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61; // Original model color
class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926; // Changed model color

    class5.anIntArray94 = new int[2]; // Number of models the NPC uses
    class5.anIntArray94[0] = 27785; // add the model id's here
    class5.anIntArray94[1] = 27789; // model id

class5.aString65 = "General Graardor"; // NPC name
class5.anInt61 = 624; //combat level
class5.aByteArray89 = "The mighty lord Bandos!".getBytes(); // NPC description

}[/code]

anything wrong with it …im new to clients so i really dont know…HELP
thanks in advance…

-t0xic

Read full topic
